thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Researcher - Sports Media

title: Researcher - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-09-2015 Brief Job Description: Create, compile and circulate information about golf, golfers and golf organizations for Morning Drive show. Maintain the accuracy and integrity of on-air content on Morning Drive and other programming.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
